task.title: How to Install a TEI Framework with the Latest Schema and Stylesheets

context.p: The TEI framework that is bundled in has the TEI schema and stylesheets that were available at the time of its release. When the TEI Consortium releases a new TEI version (Schema and Stylesheets), they also release a new version of the TEI framework with them.
context.note: TEI Consortium, who maintains these releases, chose to keep them compatible with version 18.1. This means that some features or improvements that were developed in later versions of might be missing from these frameworks.
context.p: The following procedure describes how to install a release of the TEI framework done by TEI Consortium that has a newer version of the TEI Schema and TEI XSL

step.cmd: Go to Help Install new add-ons .
Enter or paste https://www.tei-c.org/release/oxygen/updateSite.oxygen in the Show add-ons from field.
Choose the TEI framework that you want to install and click Next.
Read the end-user license agreement. Then select the I accept all terms of the end-user license agreement option and click Finish.
